com.nestedbird.util

Class UUIDConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestedbird.util.UUIDConverter

  • public class UUIDConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility functions for controlling UUIDs in string format Its primary role is converting string represented UUIDs to/from Base64

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UUIDConverter()

      Detects whether or not the string is a UUID
      static java.lang.String toBase64(java.lang.String uuidString)

    • Method Detail

      • toBase64

        public static java.lang.String toBase64(java.lang.String uuidString)
        Turns a UUID in string format to a Base64 encoded version
        Parameters:
        uuidString - String representation of the uuid
        Returns:
        base64 encoded version of the uuid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - String must be a valid uuid
        java.lang.NullPointerException - String cannot be null

      • isUUID

        public static java.lang.Boolean isUUID(java.lang.String uuidString)
        Detects whether or not the string is a UUID
        Parameters:
        uuidString - String represented UUID
        Returns:
        Whether or not the string is a UUID

      • fromBase64

        public static java.lang.String fromBase64(java.lang.String base64String)
        Converts a Base64 encoded string to a string represented UUID
        Parameters:
        base64String - Base64 Representation of the UUID
        Returns:
        String represented UUID
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - String must not be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - String should be 22 characters long
